# v2p

```text
usage: v2p [-h] vaddr

```

Translate virtual address to its corresponding physmap address.
### Positional arguments

|Positional Argument|Help|
| :--- | :--- |
|vaddr||

### Optional arguments

|Short|Long|Help|
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
|-h|--help|show this help message and exit|
